metadata.name: Kahoa 1
metadata.description:
Kahoa 1 - is a mix of peonies and roses, the pattern is a traditional motif from Niuean Hiapo (Bark Cloth)


The Kahoa series is an experimental, playful, and fun series of animated illustrations that draws inspiration from the cultural traditions of Niue. The series features designs based on the kahoa - floral garlands and aims to showcase the beauty and significance of this aspect of Niuean culture.
